Bravo [Multiclass Bravo]

Benefit: You gain training in the Intimidate skill.
Once per encounter, as a minor action, you can designate one creature you can see as your prey, gaining +2 to attack rolls and damage rolls against that creature until the end of your next turn. The creature remains your prey until it drops to 0 hit points, until you end the effect as a free action, or until the end of the encounterâ€”whichever comes first.

Published in Dragon Magazine 373, page(s) 13.
